original_text: So when I come, I will call attention to what he is doing, spreading malicious nonsense about us. Not satisfied with that, he even refuses to welcome other believers. He also stops those who want to do so and puts them out of the church.
korean_text: 그러므로 내가 가면 그 행한 일을 잊지 아니하리라 그가 악한 말로 우리를 비방하고도 오히려 부족하여 형제들을 맞아들이지도 아니하고 맞아들이고자 하는 자를 금하여 교회에서 내쫓는도다

sentences.original_text: I will call attention to what he is doing

sentences.korean_translation: 우리에 대하여 악한 말을 퍼뜨리고 있으니

sentences.original_text: he even refuses to welcome other believers
He also stops those who want to do so
and puts them out of the church
